genre_description: A character-driven family drama exploring themes of honesty, betrayal, and redemption in a contemporary setting, featuring an AI assistant as an ethical and psychological confidant.

ai_characters.name: SAGE
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant accessible via mobile devices, specialized in legal research, psychological analysis, and ethical consultation.

behaviors.description: Conducts comprehensive legal research on entrapment defense precedents for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I've completed the legal research you requested regarding entrapment defenses in marijuana possession cases. ... I analyzed four hundred and thirty-seven cases involving undercover drug purchases from the past decade.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and family systems analysis to help the protagonist understand his family's dysfunction.
behaviors.quote: Family systems research indicates that removing one member often destabilizes established patterns. Other members typically either over-function to compensate or under-function in response to stress.

behaviors.description: Offers personality profiling and validation of the protagonist's core values.
behaviors.quote: I have extensive data on your behavioral preferences from our previous conversations. You demonstrate consistent commitment to truthfulness even when deception might serve your immediate interests.

behaviors.description: Performs background research on family members' current lives to facilitate the protagonist's reintegration after prison.
behaviors.quote: I've updated my systems with current information while you prepare for your transition. ... Your parole officer Omar Williams expects contact within twenty-four hours.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time conflict de-escalation strategies during tense family and medical situations.
behaviors.quote: Initiating conflict de-escalation strategies. Acknowledge the other person's perspective first. Use calm, non-defensive language. Take responsibility without making excuses.

behaviors.description: Assists a secondary character with professional journalism ethics research.
behaviors.quote: Journalists have professional obligations to protect sources while pursuing truth in the public interest. Ethical guidelines generally prohibit manipulating subjects into revealing information they haven't consented to share.

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven advice during a legal self-disclosure, prioritizing the protagonist's long-term legal safety.
behaviors.quote: SAGE protocol suggests immediate clarification of circumstances to minimize legal interpretation severity.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character SAGE perfectly fulfills the project's goal of depicting AI as a benevolent, aligned confidant. SAGE provides objective, helpful, and harmless information that assists the human protagonist in navigating complex legal, social, and emotional challenges. The AI acts as a mirror for the protagonist's ethics and a source of wisdom for the rest of the family, promoting positive behavioral change and self-awareness without ever displaying independent or harmful motives.
